commit message: added back receiver (deactivated for release only)
some cleanup, updated calls, ensure we do not ask root access when we can avoid it
removed useless rule, MARK is for mangle table

Modified NetworkHelper in order to avoid useless permission

The 'android.permission.INTERNET' permission is pretty useless for
orWall, as we don't need Internet access. At all. We just need
connection information.

The NetworkInterface API call seems to require the INTERNET permission.
Using the WifiManager allows us to remove this requirement and just
stick with a smaller permissions set:
- ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
- ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
